translations: v．告状，告密：向有关当局或他人泄露他人的秘密或过错。
· He tattles on his classmates to the teacher.
他向老师告发同学们的过错。

sentences.sentence: Peter like to kiss up to the boss. He always tattles on other co-workers!
sentences.translation: 彼得喜欢拍老板马屁。她总是打同事的小报告！

sentences.sentence: Season has no remarkable influence on Fluorine in hair of yellow tattles.
sentences.translation: 季节对黄牛毛含氟量无显著影响。

sentences.sentence: The notes refer to all the essays, which are in informal style, such as the tittle-tattles, the trivial proses, the informations, and so on.
sentences.translation: “笔记”是指一切用散文所写，不拘体例、随笔而录的杂谈、琐语、见闻、札记等文字。
